p: The separation of samples from RESEX was due to the presence of 6-styryl-2-pyrone (RT 19.30 min; m/ z 199.0773) ( Figure 3), which was previously isolated from A. parviflora leaves [ 16, 17]. The fragment ion at m/ z 171.0809 is due to the common loss of CO. The quasi-molecular ion detected in m/z 221.0581 is the sodium adduct of 6-styryl-2-pyrone.
